Action.author: danielhardman
Action.body: I do not agree with the POA in INDY-1563, so I am against moving forward with implementation until the design is clarified.

Action.author: esplinr
Action.body: This issue is superseded by the work to move permissions to the config ledger (INDY-1732) and appropriately handle the delegation of write permissions (INDY-1999).
